title: This Week in Tech: An $1100 Saddle, New Tools, New Workout Options, and More Gran Fondo Accessibility
content:
Prologo blows the budget with an aero saddle that costs a fortune and Wahoo SYSTM comes to Zwift plus more this week in tech.

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: An $1100 Saddle, New Tools, New Workout Options, and More Gran Fondo Accessibility on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
